name: Snowπ
description:
Get into the coat of an eskimo in order to rescue all the babies that were kidnapped by the penguins and left disperse in varied places.

The game has 21 different stages!

Controls and hints:

Press Enter to start the game.

If they press "R" in their keyboard, they restart the level.

If they press spacebar, they use the pickaxe in the direction they are looking.

If they press the arrowkeys, they move!

(Pickaxe destroy triangled block)

(fire kills enemies and snowballs and melt ice)

(Square top blocks can be moved by the player)

(Boots help you move through the ice without sliding)
